welcome_message.title: Welcome to Castores Trucking VTC!
welcome_message.description: Castores Trucking, the official VTC of Team Reforma Map, welcomes you to the leading ETS2 and ATS community, recognized by TruckersMP, GAAT and our partners. Beyond truck simulators, we explore a wide range of games. With members from all over Latin America and Europe, we are an active family in public, monthly and private events.

card1.title: Castores Trucking VTC Community
card1.content: A community of virtual truckers passionate about European and American roads.

card2.title: Latin American Convoy
card2.content: Exciting Latin American convoys that allow us to get to know the company and demonstrate our drivers' skills on the road.

card3.title: Competition & Events
card3.content: Between us we make competitions, events, contests that add excitement and fun to the community and reach new goals.

card4.title: Partner Program
card4.content: Partner Program is to grow as a company, associating with other companies to give our support together, offering mutual benefits and strengthening the community between companies.

card5.title: Castores Trucking VTC Staff
card5.content: An internal team dedicated to providing the best support and giving their best service to the company and the community and providing a better experience to our drivers together with our drivers great support in the company.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.last_recruit_not_found: The new recruit was not found ðŸ˜¢

presentation.title: Team Reforma
presentation.content: See through a different mapping perspective!

card1.title: Explore our content
card1.content: Immerse yourself in rich and detailed environments, where players are compelled to continue their exploration with pleasure. We invite you to support our endeavor to create even more exceptional content.

card2.title: Virtual scenic routes
card2.content: Every detail is meticulously recreated to mirror real life, resulting in an incredibly immersive experience for the player. You can have some of our content for free.

card3.title: Breathtaking sceneries
card3.content: Explore breathtaking landscapes to bustling cities, players venture into immersive realms brought to life by stunning graphics and intricate design. If you are not sure where to start, look below.

join_vtc.title: Castores Trucking VTC - Drive Your Career Towards Success!
join_vtc.content:
If you like driving in event convoys and being part of a fun and engaged community, this is your home!
We are recognized by TruckersMP, GAAT and we have raffles, prizes, etc. At Castores Trucking Trucking we are looking for committed and enthusiastic drivers with possibilities to grow in our team. Also, because we are the only official VTC of Castores Trucking, we have the maps of Mexico in which we make internal convoys and with partners in ATS and ETS2.

### Come join our official Castores Trucking Trucking VTC!

####Why choose us?

- Active Drivers.
- Modern truck fleet.
- Growth opportunities.
- Positive environment.
- Transporting Dreams!

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: Here you will find all map downloads, both free and paid

card1.title: Reforma
card1.content: Our main Reforma map mod which covers areas in the United States and Mexico.

card2.title: Reforma mega resources
card2.content: Our main asset package file necessary for all our content.

exclusive_downloads.title: Exclusive mods for supporting us!
exclusive_downloads.description: If you would like to add some more content into your virutal world exploring!

card1.title: Reforma extremo
card1.content: Remodels older areas from the popular mod Mexico Extremo.

card2.title: Reforma noreste
card2.content: Includes additional areas to Reforma map mod such as Coahuila, San Luis Potosi state in Mexico.

card3.title: Reforma pacifico
card3.content: Includes additional areas to Reforma map mod such as Jalisco and western coastal Mexico in the pacific ocean.

card4.title: Reforma los altos
card4.content: Includes additional areas in central Mexico.

other_download.title: Other Downloads
other_download.description: Additional map mods and patches for third mods!

card1.title: Reforma sierra nevada
card1.content: Includes reworked areas in California and Nevada in the United States.

card2.title: Other maps patch
card2.content: Special file for compatibility with other maps creators.

card3.title: Promods & Reforma Background fix
card3.content: This file fixes the position of map background using Reforma and Promods and additional configurations for both maps to work.

card4.title: Reforma esterlon
card4.content: Exclusive map 1:1 of a fictional country based in Mexico and the United States with unique landscapes!.

how_to_use.title: No idea how to use our work? know more about

card1.title: What are we?
card1.content:
#### We are third party mod artitsts speciallized in mapping!

We specialize in capturing the proper feel of natural
environments for road virtual traveling. We create game
modifications currently for American Truck Simulator.

#### We offer free and paid mods

Free mods so you can test out our content, if you like our
work consider supporting us for getting more exclusively
content.

card2.title: How to work?
card2.content:
#### You need to own American Truck Simulator game on steam

You can either buy at steam, American Truck Simulator and
buy all map DLC to be able to use our content. See at
DOWNLOADS for DLC links, mod links and game links.

#### Once your own it, follow the next steps on how to install

Go over to DOWNLOADS and click on the listed links to get
our free content, once you download all the files from
there, follow the next steps.

card3.title: How to install?
card3.content:
#### Place download files into your documents/American Truck Simulator/mod

If you can't find that folder in such directory, create a
new folder called "mod", place all .SCS file inside the
folder. Unzip files if you see .rar or zip files, to use
SCS. DO NOT UNZIP or EXTRACT .SCS files.

#### Open game, American Truck Simulator

- Load your profile or create a new one.
- Go over the mod manager, and place mods in the next load order as shown in the image on the right side.
- Load up and continue game.

###### IMPORTANT!

We only support game issues when using ONLY the mods shown above. Any issues you may have while using other mods not previously mentioned (including custom bus and truck mods) will not be responsibility of the Mexico Extremo Team. Use other mods in conjunction with our mod only if you trust it completely.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Thank you for contacting us! Please complete the form below and we will we will respond by email as soon as possible. Please provide details for better service. There may delays in response due to the number of inquiries, but we will strive to be queries, but we will do our best to be quick. We look forward to resolving your concerns and providing you with a great experience! excellent experience!
